item.title: Help with attacking with hands
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

Hey I need help to stop people with attacking with hands.

my current code only works on npc but I need it to work when your pking

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (-1)) //Hands { sendMessage("Use a weap to attack someone!"); teleportToX = 3093;//3072; teleportToY = 3501;//3312; }

Ive also tried adding pkdelay and stuff but it wont work with Hands.
